title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections and Exhibits             Museum Collection   The museum collections at Valley Forge consists of a diverse set of artifacts and documents from the 1777-78 winter encampment.            Exhibit Areas   Valley Forge has many permanent and temporary exhibits within the park that showcases the natural and cultural history of Valley Forge.        Valley Forge NHP Library and Archives   The library collection contains books, reports, theses, dissertations, and periodicals related to the Encampment and the Revolution War.
